title: problem with super-fresh git 2.8.1+next.20160414: refusing to merge unrelated histories
body:
works with 2.8.1 but fails with the one available from debian experimental

```
$> git --version
git version 2.8.1.369.geae769a

$> nosetests -s -v datalad/tests/test_gitrepo.py:test_GitRepo_get_merge_base
datalad.tests.test_gitrepo.test_GitRepo_get_merge_base ... 2016-04-21 11:39:37,971 [ERROR  ] stderr| fatal: refusing to merge unrelated histories (cmd.py:351)
2016-04-21 11:39:37,972 [ERROR  ] Failed to run ['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'merge', 'master'] under '/tmp/datalad_temp_test_GitRepo_get_merge_baseb1i8gl'. Exit code=128. out= err=fatal: refusing to merge unrelated histories
|  (cmd.py:295)
ERROR

======================================================================
ERROR: datalad.tests.test_gitrepo.test_GitRepo_get_merge_base
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/venv-tests/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nose/case.py", line 197, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 455, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/tests/test_gitrepo.py", line 548, in test_GitRepo_get_merge_base
    repo.git_merge(branch1)
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/support/gitrepo.py", line 759, in git_merge
    self._git_custom_command('', ['git', 'merge'] + options + [name], **kwargs)
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/support/gitrepo.py", line 206, in newfunc
    result = func(self, files_new, *args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/support/gitrepo.py", line 636, in _git_custom_command
    env=env, shell=shell, expect_fail=expect_fail)
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/cmd.py", line 296, in run
    raise CommandError(str(cmd), msg, status, out[0], out[1])
CommandError: CommandError: command '['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'merge', 'master']' failed with exitcode 128.
Failed to run ['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'merge', 'master'] under '/tmp/datalad_temp_test_GitRepo_get_merge_baseb1i8gl'. Exit code=128. out= err=fatal: refusing to merge unrelated histories

-------------------- >> begin captured logging << --------------------
datalad.cmd: ERROR  : stderr| fatal: refusing to merge unrelated histories
datalad.cmd: ERROR  : Failed to run ['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'merge', 'master'] under '/tmp/datalad_temp_test_GitRepo_get_merge_baseb1i8gl'. Exit code=128. out= err=fatal: refusing to merge unrelated histories
| 
--------------------- >> end captured logging << ---------------------

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Ran 1 test in 0.083s

FAILED (errors=1)
```

inquiring with git folks atm either it is a feature or a regression
